# Build artifacts
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Visual Studio
.vs/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# Mac files
.DS_Store

# Node modules (if you use JS interop with npm)
node_modules/

# Logs
*.log

# JetBrains Rider
.idea/

# VS Code settings
.vscode/

# Environment files
.env
.env.*

# dotnet-generated files
wwwroot/css/app.bundle.css
wwwroot/js/app.bundle.js

# Blazor cache
**/Client/wwwroot/_framework/
**/Client/obj/

# Others (optional depending on your setup)
*.db
*.sqlite
*.db-shm
*.db-wal
